data.eml:eml: The spider genus Segestria Latreille, 1804 in South America (Araneae: Segestriidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Giroti, André Marsola, Brescovit, Antonio Domingos (2011): The spider genus Segestria Latreille, 1804 in South America (Araneae: Segestriidae). Zootaxa 3046: 59-66, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202337
